whiteList.description: Only the webhooks in the list will be exposed. If the list is empty, all the webhooks will be exposed.

blackList.description: The webhooks in the list will not be exposed. If the list is empty, no webhooks will be excluded.

deviceType.description: Select how to rappresent the webhooks on the controller. Don't use Switch for Alexa.

webhooks.description: Define each webhooks. Enter in the first field the name of the webhook (replace newKey with the name of the webhook) and in the right panel the parameters.

method.description: HTTP method to use for the webhook.

httpUrl.title: Webhook URL
httpUrl.description: URL to which the webhook will send requests.

test.description: Test the webhook by sending a request

outlets.description: Define each outlet. Enter in the first field the name of the outlet (replace newKey with the name of the outlet) and in the right panel the urls (i.e. "[GET|POST]#http://mydomain.com/api/device/on").

onUrl.title: Outlet On URL
onUrl.description: URL to turn on the outlet.

offUrl.title: Outlet Off URL
offUrl.description: URL to turn off the outlet.

lights.description: Define each light. Enter in the first field the name of the light (replace newKey with the name of the light) and in the right panel the urls (i.e. [GET|POST]#http://mydomain.com/api/device/on).

minMireds.title: Minimum Mireds
minMireds.description: Minimum color temperature in Mireds (Kelvin = 1000000 / Mireds). Default is 154 (6500K).

maxMireds.title: Maximum Mireds
maxMireds.description: Maximum color temperature in Mireds (Kelvin = 1000000 / Mireds). Default is 500 (2000K).

onUrl.title: Light On URL
onUrl.description: URL to turn on the light.

offUrl.title: Light Off URL
offUrl.description: URL to turn off the light.

brightnessUrl.title: Light Brightness URL
brightnessUrl.description: URL to adjust the brightness of the light. (i.e. [GET|POST]:http://mydomain.com/api/device?brightness=${BRIGHTNESS})

colorTempUrl.title: Light Color Temperature URL
colorTempUrl.description: URL to adjust the color temperature of the light. (i.e. [GET|POST]:http://mydomain.com/api/device?colorTemp=${MIRED})

rgbUrl.title: Light RGB URL
rgbUrl.description: URL to adjust the RGB color of the light. (i.e. [GET|POST]:http://mydomain.com/api/device?hue=${HUE}&saturation=${SATURATION})

debug.description: Enable the debug for the plugin.

unregisterOnShutdown.description: Unregister all devices on shutdown. This will remove all devices from the controller when the plugin is stopped.
